changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE student( student_id int GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY, fio varchar NOT NULL , date_of_admission date NOT NULL, grade integer NOT NULL check ( grade > 0 ), group_of_students integer REFERENCES group_of_students(group_id) ON DELETE SET NULL , sub_group int REFERENCES sub_group_of_student(sub_group_id) ON DELETE SET NULL );
